custom-sql.sql: SELECT {SyncDLObject.*} FROM SyncDLObject WHERE (SyncDLObject.modifiedTime > ?) AND (SyncDLObject.repositoryId = ?) AND (SyncDLObject.event != 'delete') AND (SyncDLObject.event != 'trash') AND (SyncDLObject.treePath LIKE ?) AND (SyncDLObject.type_ = ?) ORDER BY modifiedTime asc

SELECT DISTINCT primKey FROM ResourcePermission WHERE (companyId = ?) AND ( (name = CAST_TEXT('com.liferay.document.library.kernel.model.DLFileEntry')) OR (name = CAST_TEXT('com.liferay.document.library.kernel.model.DLFolder')) ) AND (scope = ?) AND [$TYPE_PKS$] AND (MOD(actionIds, 2) = 1) AND [$ROLE_IDS_OR_OWNER_ID$]
